techmeme.title: Toronto-based programmatic ad startup StackAdapt raised $235M led by Teachers' Venture Growth, after raising $300M from Summit Partners in 2022 (Ingrid Lunden/TechCrunch)
Sources: China is looking at launching a formal probe into Intel; a source says whether such a probe is officially launched could depend on US-China relations (Financial Times)
PayPal reports Q4 revenue up 4% YoY to $8.4B, adjusted net income down 1.9% YoY to $1.21B, above est., payment volume up 7% to $437.8B, and plans a $15B buyback (Paige Smith/Bloomberg)
Self-driving truck startup Waabi partners with Volvo to develop and deploy autonomous trucks, starting with pilots in Texas and a launch in late 2025 or 2026 (Rebecca Bellan/TechCrunch)
An investigation into 300+ cyberattacks against US K-12 schools since 2020 shows how schools can withhold crucial details from affected students and parents (Mark Keierleber/Wired)
